name: KIT109 Exam Game - Ice Slide
description:
Ice Slide Controls

Use your mouse to press the UI buttons and guide the ice block to the portals.

PLEASE NOTE - Music Starts Muted.




Features
  • Music.
  • Jump Sound Effect
  • Player Movement.
  • Level Switch.
  • Lives Counter.
  • Level Reset Button.
  • Enemies.
  • Death Walls.
  • Bounce Pads.
  • 10 Levels
  • Effectors
Sources
  1. Platforms & Heart: https://brackeysgames.itch.io/date-night
  2. Fire: https://sanctumpixel.itch.io/fire-column-pixel-art-effect
  3. UI Buttons: https://yusastudios.itch.io/pixelated-buttons?download
  4. Music: https://freesound.org/people/lindseysewell/sounds/512929/
  5. Jump Sound: https://freesound.org/people/magnuswaker/sounds/540790/  
  6. Enemy: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii
  7. Bounce pads & Player block: Andrew Tidey - andrewtidey.blogspot.co.uk
